summary: In order not to jeopardize her overseas career, an impaired woman, who had just run over a male, decides to conceal her crime with the victim trapped in the windshield.
cast: Farooq Shaikh|Celina Jaitly|Abhimanyu Singh|Rukhsar Rehman|Shammi|Shubha Khote|Dadhi Raj|Priya Ahuja|Manmeet Singh|Monica Ajinkya|Freny Bhagat|Sushma Bhagwat|Bunty Chopra|Parvez Khan|Kanchi Ashok Kumar|Krishnan Manav|Anil Mhatre|Neelima|Krishna Prem|Pranav Purohit|Sabrina|Sabrina Schaumburg|Manhat Sharma|Jay Prakash Singh|Jay Thakker
title: Accident on Hill Road
